entry.title: New Flash Resources at DevNet Center
entry.content:
We have just published some new Flash articles and resources at the DevNet Center.

  • Object-Oriented Programming in Director and Macromedia Flash
  • Securing Authentication with Flash Communication Server (pdf)
    • DRK 3 Preview: Creating a Test Plan for Your ColdFusion Apps
    • SCORM and Macromedia Flash MX Learning Objects(pdf)
      • Connecting Macromedia Flash and PHP
      • Working Seamlessly Between FreeHand and Macromedia Flash (Part 3)

      • Creating Learning Objects With Macromedia Flash MX(pdf)

      You can visit the DevNet Center here.

      [via mxna]

entry.title: New Content at DevNet Center
entry.content:
We have just published some new articles and resources at the Macromedia DevNet Center. Some of the highlights include:

  • MP3 Streaming with Macromedia Flash Communication Server
  • Using Macromedia Flash Objects from Scripting in Director MX
  • Logged In: ColdFusion MX and JRun 4 for Mac OS X
  • JD’s Forum: The Right Price for Digital Content

You can visit the DevNet Center here.

entry.title: Couple of New Flash Articles at DevNet Center
entry.content:
The DevNet Center has a had a mini update with a couple of new Flash articles.

They are:

  • Using FreeHand MX with Macromedia Flash Part 1: Logo Browser Project
  • RSS Aggregator Part II: Firefly Components and Flash Remoting

You can visit the Macromedia DevNet Center here.

Btw, you can keep up with the latest DevNet content at the MXNA Macromedia Category.

entry.title: New Flash Content at Macromedia.com
entry.content:
We have released some new Flash content and resources at the Macromedia DevNet Center. This release has a couple of articles on the Data Connection Kit and the new Flash Detection Kit.

As usual, you can view a complete list of the new articles at MXNA.

entry.title: PHP Content and Resources on Macromedia.com
entry.content:
Just a quick reminder. We have a ton of PHP content and Resources at the DevNet PHP Topic Center.

You can view the center here.
